form.phoneRequired: The Phone Number field is required.
form.phoneNumeric: The Phone Number field must contain only numbers.
form.phoneMin: The Phone Number field must be at least 4 characters in length.
form.phoneMax: The Phone Number field cannot exceed 14 characters in length.
form.countryCodeRequired: The Country Code field is required.
form.countryCodeNumeric: The Country Code field must contain only numbers.
form.codeNumeric: The Code field must contain only numbers.

error.try: An error occurred while sending data, Please try again.

text.pageTitle: Websites and Apps 은 귀하의 전하번호를 수신하지 않습니다.

text.afterSuccessful: 인증에 성공하면 번호가 영구적으로 삭제되고 임의의 식별자만 저장됩니다.
